All Classes

Class Description
ChaCha20IETFPoly1305EncryptionParameters
ChaCha20-IETF-Poly1305 Data Encryption Parameters.
ChaCha20IETFPoly1305Segment
Data segment, ChaCha20 encrypted, 65564 bytes long (according to the current spec).
Cipher
Cipher name
Crypt4GHEntity
Crypt4GH entity, mostly to extend Serializable interface, but also to provide LittleEndian conversion methods.
Crypt4GHInputStream
Crypt4GHInputStream that wraps existing InputStream.
Crypt4GHOutputStream
Crypt4GHOutputStream that wraps existing OutputStream.
Crypt4GHUtils
A bunch of methods mostly for working with Crypt4GH headers.
DataEditList
Data Edit List.
DataEncryptionMethod
Data encryption methods.
DataEncryptionParameters
Data Encryption Parameters, bears Data Encryption Method.
EncryptableEntity
Crypt4GH entity that is supposed to be encrypted/decrypted.
EncryptableHeaderPacket
Header packet that can be encrypted, bears packet type.
Format
Key format name
Header
Crypt4GH header containing both unencrypted and encrypted payloads.
HeaderEncryptionMethod
Header encryption methods.
HeaderPacket
Header packet, bearing its length encryption type and encrypted payload.
HeaderPacketType
Header packet types, for now only two available: Data Encryption Parameters and Data Edit List.
KDF
Key Derivation Function.
KeyUtils
A bunch of methods for generating/constructing/reading/writing/deriving keys.
Main
Console application for encrypting/decrypting files.
Segment
Data segment: 65536 bytes long unencrypted and 65564 bytes long encrypted (according to the current spec).
X25519ChaCha20IETFPoly1305HeaderPacket
X25519 ChaCha20-IETF-Poly1305 encrypted header packet.
